CustomField.description: This formula equals Amount for non-billable Expenses and Non-Billable Incurred Amount and Tax (anywhere from zero to Expense Amount) for billable Expenses: all in the incurred currency.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula equals Amount for non-billable Expenses and Non-Billable Incurred Amount and Tax (anywhere from zero to Expense Amount) for billable Expenses: all in the incurred currency.
CustomField.label: Non-Billable Amount
